node.detail_zh:
由 3 月 25 日凌晨零時起，非香港居民從海外國家或地區乘搭飛機抵港不准入境；及
從內地、澳門和台灣入境香港的非香港居民，如在過去 14 天曾經到過任何海外國家或地區，亦不准入境。
node.detail_en: With effect from 0.00am on Mar 25, all non-Hong Kong residents coming from overseas countries and regions by plane will be denied entry to Hong Kong; and non-Hong Kong residents coming from the Mainland, Macao and Taiwan will be denied entry to Hong Kong if they have been to any overseas countries and regions in the past 14 days.

node.detail_zh: 由 1 月 27 日起，任何湖北省居民以及於抵港前 14 天到過湖北省的非香港居民進入香港。
node.detail_en: Any Hubei residents, and non-Hong Kong residents who have visited the Hubei Province in the past 14 days upon arrival barred from entering Hong Kong since Jan 27.

node.detail_zh: 由內地、澳門或台灣抵港人士（包括香港居民、內地居民及其他地區旅客，除了在《若干到港人士強制檢疫規例》下獲豁免的人士外，必須在指定地點（家居或其他住所）接受強制檢疫。抵港前 14 天曾到任何海外國家或地區的香港居民，除了在《外國地區到港人士強制檢疫規例》下獲豁免的人士外，必須在指定地點（家居或其他住所）接受強制檢疫。
node.detail_en: Inbound travellers from the Mainland, Macao or Taiwan, including Hong Kong and non-Hong Kong residents have to be under compulsory quarantine at designated places (home or other accommodation) apart from the exempted persons under the "Compulsory Quarantine of Certain Persons Arriving at Hong Kong Regulation". Hong Kong residents arriving in Hong Kong who have been to any overseas countries or areas in the past 14 days are subject to compulsory quarantine at designated places (home or other accommodation) apart from the exempted persons under the "Compulsory Quarantine of Certain Persons Arriving at Hong Kong from Foreign Places Regulation"

node.detail_zh: 外籍人士只要在14日內，曾經入境或居住在大陸、香港或澳門，暫緩入境台灣。即使有特殊原因，台灣駐外辦事處亦不再受理簽證申請。
node.detail_en: Taiwan banned all foreign nationals who had been to mainland China, Hong Kong and Macau in the past 14 days.

node.detail_zh: 過去14日曾訪中國內地或香港人士禁止入境
node.detail_en: People who travelled to mainland China or Hong Kong in the past 14 days were banned fro entering Bahrain.

node.detail_zh: 過去14日曾訪中國內地、香港、日本、韓國、星加坡、泰國人士禁止入境
node.detail_en: People who travelled to mainand China, Hong Kong, Japan,  South Korea, Thailand and Singapore in the past 14 days were banned from entering Israel.

node.detail_zh: 暫時禁止所有中國公民，包括香港及澳門居民，以旅遊、工作、教育或私人理由入境當地。有關限制不影響過境旅客
node.detail_en: Temporarily ban Chinese, Hong Kong and Macao residents from entering China for tourism, work, education or personal reasons starting on 20 Feb

node.detail_zh: 禁止持有中國、香港特區護照的旅客入境，禁令亦包括過去2週內曾入境至中國或香港，任何國籍旅客已備有科威特居留證或簽證的公民
node.detail_en: All citizens who stayed in China, Hong Kong in past two weeks banned from traveling to Kuwait

node.detail_zh: 過去14天內曾到訪／過境中國內地、香港或澳門的外籍人士，不得進入菲律賓。 從中國回國的菲律賓人和菲律賓居民將要隔離14日。
node.detail_en: Travellers who have travelled from/transited through China, Hong Kong or Macao are not permitted to enter. Philippine citizens must undergo a 14 day home quarantine on arrival.

node.detail_zh: 禁止所有外國遊客入境，不分國籍，全面執關
node.detail_en: Banned all the travllers who are not from North Korea

node.detail_zh: 持有中華人民共和國、香港特別行政區、澳門特別行政區或台灣護照，都不能落地簽證，事前獲簽證的仍可以入境
node.detail_en: Visa on Arrival (VOA) service is suspended for foreigners from People’s Republic of China (including Hong Kong SAR, Macau SAR and Taiwan). Travellers already have a Bangladesh visa are permitted to enter.

node.detail_zh: 禁止所有非加拿大公民和非永久居民入境，美國公民、外交人員、航空公司機組人員豁免限制
node.detail_en: Borders closed to non-citizens and non-residents, exceptions including immediate family members of Canadian citizens, foreign diplomats, airline crews and U.S. citizens.

node.detail_zh: 暫停香港及澳門人士的免簽證入境安排
node.detail_en: Visa exemption for Hong Kong, Macau and the Republic of Korea will be suspended.

node.detail_zh: 所有外地居民入境必須自我隔離 14 日
node.detail_en: All foreign nationals who enter Nepal must remain in self-quarantine for 14 days from their arrival date.

node.detail_zh: 所有旅遊簽證暫停，外交，聯合國及國際組織訪問除外直至 4月15日
node.detail_en: Suspended most travel and tourism visas, with the exception of “diplomatic, official, U.N. or International Organizations, employment and project visas” until April 15

node.detail_zh: 建議所有國際航班乘客留在家中隔離 7 日及若有不適早日就醫
node.detail_en: It is recommended that all passengers who arrive on international flights remain at home for at least seven days and seek medical help if they develop coronavirus symptoms.

node.detail_zh: 停止來往意大利和中國、香港及台灣的航班至4月29日。香港保安局勸喻香港人計劃前往艾米利亞-羅馬涅、倫巴第及威尼托地區的市民應調整行程，如非必要，避免前赴該三個地區
node.detail_en: Flights between Italy, China, Hong Kong and Taiwan are suspended until Apr 29.
node.status_zh: 全面停止來往香港航班

node.detail_zh: 禁止外地居民入境，只有少數例外
node.detail_en: All foreign nationals, with very limited exceptions,” are prohibited from entering or transiting through Malaysia until March 31
node.status_en: All foreign nationals are banned from entering

node.detail_zh: 邊境由3 月16日開始關閉
node.detail_en: Borders will be shut down for at least 15 days, starting on March 16
node.status_en: All foreign nationals are banned from entering

node.detail_zh: 邊境關閉15日
node.detail_en: Borders will be shut down for at least 15 days
node.status_en: All foreign nationals are banned from entering

node.detail_zh: 禁止外地居民入境，只有外交官員及合法永久居民例外
node.detail_en: All foreign nationals, except accredited diplomats and legal permanent residents,” are prohibited from entering
node.status_en: All foreign nationals are banned from entering

node.detail_zh: 禁止外地居民入境 21 日
node.detail_en: All foreign nationals are prohibited from entering for 21 days
node.status_en: All foreign nationals are banned from entering

node.detail_zh: 由3 月18日禁止外地居民入境
node.detail_en: All foreign nationals are prohibited from entering starting Mar 18
node.status_en: All foreign nationals are banned from entering

node.detail_zh: 由3 月18日禁止14 日內到過歐洲或亞洲外地人士入境
node.detail_en: Starting March 16, Colombia will bar entry to any foreigner who has been to Europe or Asia within the past 14 days.
node.status_en: All foreign nationals are banned from entering

node.detail_zh: 由3 月16日禁止外地居民入境
node.detail_en: All foreign nationals are prohibited from entering starting Mar 16
node.status_en: All foreign nationals are banned from entering

node.detail_zh: 由3 月15日禁止外地居民入境
node.detail_en: All foreign nationals are prohibited from entering starting Mar 15
node.status_en: All foreign nationals are banned from entering

node.detail_zh: 美國3大航空公司（聯合航空、美國航空和達美航空）暫停來往中港航班，延期至4月下旬才復飛。
node.detail_en: American Airlines, Delta Airlines and United Airlines suspend services between US to China and Hong Kong through late Apr.
node.status_zh: 停止部分來往香港航班
node.status_en: Partial suspension of flights to HK

node.detail_zh: 政府呼籲市民避免所有非必要的外遊計劃。
node.detail_en: HKSARG urges members of the public to avoid non-essential travel outside Hong Kong.
